name: Ball game (itch) (jaideep)
description:
A simple game where you controll a bouncing ball using arrow keys to collect score boxes before the time runs out.

Play with your friends to see who scores more...!

The timer can be adjusted before the game using a slider or a text box!

Also features an infinite time mode for times when you just don't have anything else to do...!

Runs smooth. Made with Unity. Small file size.
